sectionAbout.title: Welcome to Happy365Global
sectionAbout.content: With the mission of creating a united Affiliate marketing community, where everyone can grow their business and access quality products and services. Happy365Global Group is committed to providing support, training and development opportunities to help participants achieve success and meet their goals.

sectionInfo.title: What we bring
sectionInfo.content: If you are looking for a fast-paced, collaborative environment, you will enjoy a culture of innovation and fact-driven results.

sectionProduct.title: Our Products
sectionProduct.content: Offering customers thousands of healthy products

sectionStrategy.subTitle: About Happy 365 Global
sectionStrategy.title: Why choose us
sectionStrategy.content: HAPPY365GLOBAL focuses on researching solutions and applying advanced scientific achievements, friendly to the environment, people and nature.

list1.title: Nutrition strategy
list1.content: We use 5 different ways to speed up your metabolism so you burn calories. Our main aim is to improve healthy eating information & inner strength.

list2.title: Support & Motivation
list2.content: We use 5 different ways to speed up your metabolism so you burn calories. Our main aim is to improve healthy eating information & inner strength.

sectionStrategy.reasons: Eight reasons to cooperate with HAPPY365GLOBAL
sectionStrategy.desc3: Accumulate group sales with unlimited TIME to level up
sectionStrategy.desc4: When the downline is at the same level or higher, it will not be separated from the group
sectionStrategy.desc5: Passive income from your own business
sectionStrategy.desc7: Leveling up does not depend on personal sales

sectionAboutUs.subTitle: Our story
sectionAboutUs.title: We provide the world's best health products
sectionAboutUs.content: HAPPY365GLOBAL GROUP is an organization with the motto: Consulting solutions to bring happiness and inspiration to each member's life around the world. Providing health care solutions by using product lines of natural origin, distilled by advanced science, used correctly, sufficiently and reasonably.

sectionHeath.title: Health News

aboutHappy365.mission quote: End poverty, end debt, start a new golden age!
aboutHappy365.mission description: HAPPY365GLOBAL Group is an organization with the mission of consulting and solutions to bring happiness and inspiration to the lives of all members around the world. By using products of natural origin, refined by advanced science, used correctly, sufficiently and reasonably.
aboutHappy365.description:
Prepare for a world where poverty, debt and unemployment are relics of the past, replaced by global prosperity and lasting peace for all!

As global science advances, we are facing a world where prosperity, freedom and innovation thrive, and the human spirit flourishes without material burdens.

A rejuvenation biomedical doctor specializing in herbal treatment and acupuncture at the age of 8. A very active Ambassador in applying clean green food and agriculture technology to adapt to climate change and be environmentally friendly. Dr. Nguyen Thi Giang Van is also a philosopher, artist, poet and green energy promoter. Originating from the concerns about the lives of people around the world, the dream of creating a home --- “The world is filled with love, joy and happiness”.

The idea of creating a HAPPY365GLOBAL community was conceived and concretized by Dr. Nguyen Thi Giang Van with an action plan from March 2018. But soon after in 2019, the COVID epidemic spread globally, causing it to interruption. By 2022 HAPPY365GLOBAL continues to be realized.
aboutHappy365.about founder:
Founder of HAPPY365GLOBAL Group Nguyen Thi Giang Van is currently the Ambassador for the PRIME WORLD TRUST PTE. LTD. Global Climate Change Organization based in the USA. As Ambassador representing Southeast Asia and South Asia with representative office in Singapore.

Address: 531A UPPER CROSS STREET #04-95 HONG LIM COMPLEX SINGAPORE (051531)
aboutHappy365.description-2:
We understand very clearly the value of happiness in every minute of 365 days a year. That is why HAPPY365GLOBAL Group is here to support solutions for the Asian community in particular and the world in general.

HAPPINESS IS IN YOUR HAND! Believe in yourself, think simply, take small steps and unite the community. You will achieve happiness within your reach that you never expected. Thank you very much for coming to us. HAPPY 365 GLOBAL! WE LOVE YOU ALL
aboutHappy365.footer-banner: HAPPY 365 GLOBAL! WE LOVE YOU ALL!

founderMessage.title: Founder message
founderMessage.missionQuote: End poverty, end debt, start a new golden age!
founderMessage.missionDescription: HAPPY365GLOBAL GROUP is an organization with the motto: Consulting solutions that bring happiness and inspiration to the lives of every member around the world. Providing health care solutions by using products of natural origin, filtered by advanced science, used correctly, sufficiently and reasonably.
founderMessage.founderQuote: Founder of HAPPY365GLOBAL Group and Ambassador for the PRIME WORLD TRUST PTE. LTD. Global Climate Change Organization based in the USA. As Ambassador representing Southeast Asia and South Asia with representative office in Singapore.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Happy365Global's mission is to create a united Affiliate marketing community. Where everyone can develop their business and access quality products and services. The Group is committed to providing training support, providing opportunities for personal development, helping participants achieve success and meet their health and financial goals.

vision.title: Vission
vision.content: Happy365Global aims to become a leading Group in the field of Affiliate marketing, bringing development and success opportunities to participants. The Group wishes to build a sustainable and reliable Affiliate marketing business model. Create favorable conditions for members to achieve success in health, finance and beauty.

goal.title: Goals
goal.content: HAPPY365GLOBAL organizes programs, events, and community activities to encourage people to take positive actions and build a good environment for happiness. This organization also cooperates with partners who are businesses, scientific research institutes and other organizations around the world to learn and apply scientific achievements into smart health care and building a better life. Live a positive, prosperous economic life, spread the message of happiness and create a better life for everyone.

vision.bottomText: We understand very clearly the value of happiness in every minute of 365 days a year. That is the reason why HAPPY365GLOBAL Group is here to support solutions for the Asian community in particular and the world in general.
